name: Bounce Bounce Pegolution
description:
Spawn your ballmeba and collect DNA. Use your DNA to purchase evolutions.  You must continue to evolve, but don't go too crazy because each evolution makes your ballmeba more expensive to spawn you may have to devolve to survive.

Evolutions

  • Digestion - Eat pegs for score multiplier
  • Density - Makes you extra heavy
  • Photosynthesis - DNA growth over time
  • Resilient - Extra bouncy
  • Reproduction - get free ballmeba after hitting pegs
  • Survival - ballmeba respawns after exiting stage
